name: Corner Quest
description:
Corner Quest is a 2D grid-based RPG featuring turn-based combat and exploration across tiled game boards. Its design is a mashup of old and new turn-based classics with a "modern" clean pixel aesthetic.

THE GOAL:

>  Reach all 4 Corner Tiles in each level to unlock the next in series!

THE OBSTACLES:

>  The journey will not be easy! Watch out for numerous biome tiles offering battles with all sorts of enemy types, fortresses with dangerous bosses and exclusive treasures inside, magic temples, dark caves, strange towers, ancient ruins, and more.

Game Features:

>  Over 20  unique Game Tiles to Explore

>  Over 30 unique Enemies:

>  Over 50 unique Items and Equipment:

>  Shops to buy and sell items in,

 >  Boss Guardians that bar the way to dangerous Bosses,

>  Random Treasures for a pleasant surprise, 

>  Unique Encounters with good and bad consequences, 

>  A variety of Battle Skills to keep the combat moving, 

>  Creature Shards to collect and form into stat-boosting Creatures,

and a whole lot of awkward cuteness!

Take a whimsical journey through the 8 unique levels Corner Quest has to offer.

>  More levels and content planned for the future!
